name: Toddy Saves Christmas
description:
Made for the Yogscast Game Jam 2021. With the theme of opposites, you are the only melee fighter in a world of range attackers. A 3rd person action game inspired by dark souls and mordauh.

Controls:

Attack: Left Click 

Physical Block: RightClick 

Magical Block: Q

Heal: Left Crtl 

Menu: Esc
